name: Planet Evolution PC Live Wallpaper
detailed_description:
Planet Evolution PC Live Wallpaper


Our latest project focuses on the beauty of planetary evolution.


In the universe, we can observe infinite possibilities of a combination of planets and places. It's the same here! Every planet and place where it's located will be unique so every time you will see the evolution of your wallpaper.

Main functions:


- Procedural planets that are evolving in front of your eyes.

- The procedural environment that also changes with the time of evolution.

- Procedural cameras that will always provide you with amazing views.

- Low consumption of CPU / GPU resources.

- Support for multiple screens.

- Includes the "Game Mode" feature to minimize the wallpaper while playing normal games.

- Menu options

- Updates

- And more...

Attention!

The project works only on Windows 10!

Performance:
Efficiency is our priority! This project is mostly built of procedural textures and the rest is loaded at the beginning. The consumption is very small but you can always set your options in the menu just like in a normal game.

4K screen users:
The wallpaper will work at a maximum resolution of 4K. Higher resolution can have a slight effect on your computer's performance. However, I have a 4K screen and the performance drop is insignificant.

Procedurality of planets:
Changes in the planet are not accidental or random. We tried to keep some realism, which means that we will never see the ice planet right after the magma.

False anti-virus reports:
Unfortunately, most of this type of projects in this store gets a fake report from some anti-viruses.

Steam has a problem with anti-knowledge about what he writes here:

For more information please check our "Community HUB".

The wallpaper itself is clean (made in Unity3D) and Steam confirmed it and allowed it to shop after thorough tests.

You can read more about this in our "Community"

Support
We are a small team that wants to create interactive applications that diversify known Windows wallpapers. We try to make each project unique, introducing something new to the screen. Each support is valuable to us. Ratings and comments help us move forward and create even better interactive wallpapers.

Planet Evolution PC Live Wallpaper is a project that was created thanks to your help. Thank you very much and we encourage you to support it through reviews and activity in the community. Every help is very important to us. Thank you.

If you notice any problems, check our "Community HUB" or contact directly.


Thank you and we wish you nice flights! ;)

short_description: The beauty of the evolution of planets as your wallpaper. In a few minutes you can see the changes that have taken place on the planets for several million years. Everything is generated procedurally so you will never see the same wallpaper!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Only
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows 10 Only!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Only
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4690K CPU @ 3.50GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 4GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows 10 Only!
